C

canMove(MapObject, GamePhysics.CollisionType) - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks if it is possible for the player or enemy to move in the game.
canPlaceBomb(Player) - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks if it is possible for the player to place a bomb.
checkExplosionCollisions() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks if the explosion collided with other objects on the map and destroys the object if it is an enemy, player, or a soft block.
checkGameOver() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks if the player has run out of lives and if the player has, the method then ends the game.
checkGameWon() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks if the player has completed a level and goes to the next level if there are no more enemies on the map.
checkPowerupCollisions() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks if a player has collided with a powerup.
collidesWith(MapObject, MapObject, GamePhysics.CollisionType) - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method checks collisions between map objects in the game and returns true if any of the collision types occur.
commitScore(Player) - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method takes as input a player and takes the score of the player from the GameStatus.
consume(Powerup) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets what happens when the player consumes a powerup.
